content.text: Sleepy is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.

Sleepy is a overweight man with an oval shaped body. He has thick lips and squinted eyes, similar to a fish. He wears a pirate hat at an angle, that seems to have a flower on it. He wears a tuxedo, with a light colored coat, white shirt, and bowtie. He also has dark colored pants.
Not much is known about Sleepy's personality other than that he is very loyal to Whitebeard since he was willing to risk his own life to save Ace from execution.
Sleepy is a fearsome pirate who has managed to achieve an infamous reputation in the New World, and he made an alliance with Whitebeard.
Some time prior to the current storyline, Sleepy became a known pirate in the New World, and allied himself with Whitebeard.
When Portgas D. Ace was to be executed at Marineford, Sleepy and his crew joined forces with the Whitebeard Pirates to save him.
He, along with the rest of the crew, probably attended the funeral of Whitebeard and Ace on an undisclosed location somewhere in the New World.
